regen.absent_element: reception of telemetry and payload data downlink when AV is within Line Of Sight
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall receive and process telemetry and payload data from the AV via the downlink regardless of the AV's location relative to the Line Of Sight.

regen.absent_element: reception of telemetry and payload data downlink in Beyond Line Of Sight
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall receive and process telemetry and payload data from the AV via the downlink while Beyond Line Of Sight.

regen.absent_element: reception of command and control transmission confirmation from the AV
regen.new_specification: The system shall confirm receipt of command and control information by the AV

label: The TCS shall receive AV telemetry and payload information via downlink from the AV
absence: action of receiving data via downlink from the AV
